entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 3:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -26.5°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -29.9°C
Wind: NNW 43 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:23 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:23 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Near blizzard developing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:23 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
